prompt: An intimate jazz piano trio playing in a small club. The piano comps mellow chords with a straight eighth-note feel, no swing. A deep upright bass anchors the harmony while soft brush drums keep a steady, even pulse. Relaxed and contemplative mood. Instrumental, no vocals.
